mutants.code:
import re
from typing import List

def filter_words(words: List[str], minlength: int, maxlength: int) -> List[str]:
    filtered_words = []
    specials = re.compile('')
    lowers = re.compile('[a-z]')
    uppers = re.compile('[A-Z]')
    for word in words:
        word = word.strip()
        if minlength <= len(word) <= maxlength and specials.search(word) is not None and (lowers.search(word) is not None) and (uppers.search(word) is not None):
            filtered_words.append(word)
    return filtered_words

import re
from typing import List

def filter_words(words: List[str], minlength: int, maxlength: int) -> List[str]:
    filtered_words = []
    specials = re.compile('[^A-Za-z0-9\\s]')
    lowers = re.compile('[a-z]')
    uppers = re.compile('[A-Z]')
    for word in words:
        word = word.strip()
        if minlength <= len(word) <= maxlength and specials.search(word) is not None and (lowers.search(word) is not None) and (uppers.search(word) is None):
            filtered_words.append(word)
    return filtered_words
